mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM deal_user_store WHERE deal_user_id = #{dealUserId} AND examine = #{examine}

SELECT deal_store_id, deal_store_name, deal_user_job, image, sys_user_id, sys_user_name, examine, examine_user_id, examine_time FROM deal_user_store WHERE deal_user_id = #{dealUserId} ORDER BY apply_time DESC

SELECT deal_user.deal_user_name, deal_user_store.deal_user_id, deal_user_store.deal_store_id, deal_user_store.deal_store_name, deal_user_store.image, deal_user_store.deal_user_job, deal_user_store.sys_user_id, deal_user_store.sys_user_name, deal_user_store.examine, deal_user_store.apply_time, deal_user_store.examine_user_id, deal_user_store.examine_time FROM deal_user_store AS deal_user_store JOIN deal_user AS deal_user ON deal_user_store.deal_user_id = deal_user.deal_user_id WHERE deal_user_store.deal_store_id = #{dealStoreId}
SELECT deal_store_id, deal_store_name, deposit_price, credit_grade, image, sys_user_name FROM deal_user_store WHERE deal_user_id = #{dealUserId} AND examine = #{examine}
